pageContext.claim: “Well, it's going to be probably 6,000, 7,000 jobs; it could go up to 10 [thousand] in Wisconsin alone. And it's a great shipyard that was on hard times, and now it's a very good shipyard, and a lot of people are going to be working.”
pageContext.analysis: The government contract Trump is referring to, a $5.5 billion deal to build 10 Navy ships, will allow the Wisconsin company Fincantieri Marinette Marine to nearly double its workforce with an additional 1,000 employees who will focus on the project for the next decade. That's far from the 6,000 to 10,000 jobs Trump claimed.
